name: TransformerUtils_switchMapTransformerTest
description: Unit tests for the switchMapTransformer method in TransformerUtils.

test_cases.name: testSwitchMapTransformer_WithDefaultTransformer
test_cases.description: Tests the switchMapTransformer method with a default transformer.

test_cases.name: testSwitchMapTransformer_WithoutDefaultTransformer
test_cases.description: Tests the switchMapTransformer method without a default transformer.

test_cases.name: testSwitchMapTransformer_WithNullInput
test_cases.description: Tests the switchMapTransformer method with a null input.

test_cases.name: testSwitchMapTransformer_WithEmptyMap
test_cases.description: Tests the switchMapTransformer method with an empty map.

test_cases.name: testSwitchMapTransformer_WithNullMap
test_cases.description: Tests the switchMapTransformer method with a null map, expecting a NullPointerException.
